languages.text: {n}Кассия смущенно отводит глаза.{/n} "Мне немногое ведомо о том, как... сходятся обычные пары. Книги, которые я читала, обходили эту сторону жизни молчанием. Быть может, стихотворение, идущее от сердца? Впрочем, не уверена, что Джай любит стихи".

{n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия смущенно отводит глаза.{/n} "Мне немногое ведомо о том, как... сходятся обычные пары. Книги, которые я читала, обходили эту сторону жизни молчанием. Быть может, стихотворение, идущее от сердца? Впрочем, не уверена, что Джай любит стихи".

{n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read have always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

{n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read have always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

{n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read have always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

languages.text: {n}Cassia baja la mirada, avergonzada.{/n} «No sé mucho sobre la... unión de parejas convencionales. Los libros que he leído siempre pasaban por alto ese aspecto de la vida, era un tema tabú. ¿Un poema emotivo, quizá? Aunque no creo que Jae disfrute de la poesía».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia baja la mirada, avergonzada.{/n} «No sé mucho sobre la... unión de parejas convencionales. Los libros que he leído siempre pasaban por alto ese aspecto de la vida, era un tema tabú. ¿Un poema emotivo, quizá? Aunque no creo que Jae disfrute de la poesía».

languages.text: {n}カシアは恥ずかしそうに床を見つめた。{/n}「一般的な恋人がどのように縁を結ぶのか…私はほとんどわかりません。これまで読んできた本は、そのような人生の側面について触れていませんでした。心のこもった詩を送るのはどうでしょう？ ジェイが詩を喜ぶかどうかはわかりませんが」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは恥ずかしそうに床を見つめた。{/n}「一般的な恋人がどのように縁を結ぶのか…私はほとんどわかりません。これまで読んできた本は、そのような人生の側面について触れていませんでした。心のこもった詩を送るのはどうでしょう？ ジェイが詩を喜ぶかどうかはわかりませんが」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅尴尬地低下了头。{/n}“我对寻常情侣如何走到一起……知之甚少。我所读过的书籍，要么是对生活的这一部分保持沉默，要么是在刻意回避。或许你可以送她一首发自内心的情诗？虽然我不确定婕伊是否喜欢诗歌。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅尴尬地低下了头。{/n}“我对寻常情侣如何走到一起……知之甚少。我所读过的书籍，要么是对生活的这一部分保持沉默，要么是在刻意回避。或许你可以送她一首发自内心的情诗？虽然我不确定婕伊是否喜欢诗歌。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia baisse les yeux d'un air gêné.{/n} « Je sais très peu de choses sur... la façon dont se forment les couples ordinaires. Les livres que j'ai pu lire ont toujours passé sous silence cet aspect des relations humaines. Un poème émouvant, peut-être ? Enfin, je ne suis pas sûre que Jae aime la poésie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia baisse les yeux d'un air gêné.{/n} « Je sais très peu de choses sur... la façon dont se forment les couples ordinaires. Les livres que j'ai pu lire ont toujours passé sous silence cet aspect des relations humaines. Un poème émouvant, peut-être ? Enfin, je ne suis pas sûre que Jae aime la poésie. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt verschämt zu Boden.{/n} "Ich weiß nur sehr wenig darüber, wie ... gewöhnliche Paare zusammenkommen. Die Bücher, die ich gelesen habe, umschiffen diese Seite des Lebens immer, schweigen sich zu dem Thema aus. Ein von Herzen kommendes Gedicht, vielleicht? Ich weiß aber nicht, ob Jae Freude an Gedichten hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

Die Bücher, die ich gelesen habe, umschiffen diese Seite des Lebens immer, schweigen sich zu dem Thema aus. Ein von Herzen kommendes Gedicht, vielleicht? Ich weiß aber nicht, ob Jae Freude an Gedichten hat."

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read have always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

languages.text: {n}Cassia, mahcubiyetten başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sıradan çiftlerin nasıl... Bir araya geldiği hakkında pek bir bilgim yok. Okuduğum kitaplarda yaşamın o yanını es geçer, hiç bahsetmezlerdi. İçten bir şiir olabilir mi mesela? Gerçi Jae şiir sever mi bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks down in embarrassment.{/n} "I know very little about how... ordinary couples come together. The books I have read always skirted around that side of life, keeping silent on the matter. A heartfelt poem, perhaps? I'm not sure Jae enjoys poetry, though."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia mahcubiyetten başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sıradan çiftlerin nasıl... Bir araya geldiği hakkında pek bir bilgim yok. Okuduğum kitaplarda yaşamın o yanını es geçer, hiç bahsetmezlerdi. Acaba içten bir şiir olur mu mesela? Gerçi Jae şiir sever mi bilmiyorum."
